name: Game Jam Blues
description:
The game is made by me (a single developer) in less then 24 hours and is a single room experience with no menu's whatsoever. If you encounter a problem, please let me know! Since I was low on time, there was some use of free unity assets. I'd like to credit them:

- CubePeopleDemo (link)
- LowPolyOffice (link)

BGM: 

https://freesound.org/people/SSS_Samples/sounds/397590/

https://freesound.org/people/FunWithSound/sounds/456968/  - FunWithSound 

SFX:
https://freesound.org/people/dr_skitz/sounds/353925/

https://freesound.org/people/Posontic/sounds/446021/

https://freesound.org/people/JustInvoke/sounds/446142/

Regards,

Marius
